title: Pakistani seekh kebabs
ingredients: ['1 medium onion, quartered', '2 to 3 green chillies, or to taste', '4 large cloves of garlic', '2.5cm (1 in) piece root ginger', '2 medium potatoes', '675g (1 1/2 lb) lamb mince', '1 egg', '1 tablespoon gram (chickpea) flour', '1/2 tablespoon salt', '1/2 tablespoon chilli powder, or to taste', '1/2 tablespoon coriander powder', '1/2 tablespoon cumin powder', 'good handful of finely chopped fresh coriander leaves', '1/2 lemon, juiced', '10 bamboo skewers, soaked in water']
